n=int(input())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
print(n*max(a)-sum(a))

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = max(a)
print(sum([x - a[i] for i in range(n)]))

import sys
n = int(input())
z = list(map(int, input().split()))
a = max(z) * n
print(a - sum(z))

def main():
	n = int(input())
	arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
	x = max(arr)
	print(sum([x - i for i in arr]))


main()

n = int(input())
v = list(map(int, input().split()))

mx = max(v)
v = [mx-x for x in v]
print(sum(v))

n=int(input())
ip=list(map(int,input().split()))
ans=0

for i in ip:
    ans+=t-i
print(ans)

from sys import stdin, stdout
n = int(stdin.readline())
values = list(map(int, stdin.readline().split()))
mx = max(values)

cnt = 0
for i in range(n):
    cnt += mx - values[i]
    
stdout.write(str(cnt))

ans = 0
m = max(a)
for elem in a:
    ans += m - elem
    
print(ans)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int , input().split()))
maxim = max(a)
ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    ans += a[i] - maxim
print(-ans)

n = int(input())

a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

m = max(a)

min_sum = 0
for elem in a:
    min_sum += m - elem

print(min_sum)

n = int(input())
A = list(map(int,input().split()))
t = max(A)
sums = 0
for j in range(n):
    sums += (t - A[j])
print(sums)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = max(a)
s = 0
for i in range(n):
    s += x - a[i]
print(s)

n = int(input())
v = list(map(int, input().split()))
m = max(v)
result = m * n - sum(v)
print(result)

n=int(input())
listi=[int(x) for x in input().split()]
s=0
m=max(listi)
for i in listi:
    s=s+(m-i)
print(s)
